props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: hitAreaMargins
props.description: Allow this much margin when determining resizable handle hit detection

props.name: id
props.description: Resize handle id (unique within group); falls back to `useId` when not provided

props.name: nonce
props.description:
Will add `nonce` attribute to the style tag which can be used by Content Security Policy.
If omitted, inherits globally from `ConfigProvider`.

events.name: dragging
events.description: Event handler called when dragging the handler.
